sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AisLanguageChoiceList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AisLanguageChoiceList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AisLanguageChoiceList = Class.create();
AisLanguageChoiceList.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    process: function(allowAll) {
        if (allowAll == null)
            allowAll = false;
        var choiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
        var defaultLanguages = {
            "en": gs.getMessage("English"),
        };
        if (allowAll)
            defaultLanguages["AIS_GLOBAL_LOCALE"] = gs.getMessage("All Languages");
        var retrievedIds = {};
        if (gs.tableExists('sys_language')) {
            var languages = new GlideRecord('sys_language');
            languages.addQuery('active', 'true');
            languages.setLimit(1000);
            languages.query();
            while (languages.next())
                retrievedIds[languages.getValue('id')] = languages.getDisplayValue();
        }

        for (var id in defaultLanguages)
            if (!retrievedIds[id]) retrievedIds[id] = defaultLanguages[id];

        var curLanguage = new GlideSession().getLanguage();
        if (retrievedIds[curLanguage] != null)
            choiceList.add(curLanguage, gs.getMessage(retrievedIds[curLanguage]));

        for (var langID in retrievedIds) {
            if (langID != curLanguage)
                choiceList.add(langID, gs.getMessage(retrievedIds[langID]));
        }

        return choiceList;
    },

    type: 'AisLanguageChoiceList'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-09 19:27:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8ff901b8b72230109fa9b381de11a9f2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AisLanguageChoiceList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ff901b8b72230109fa9b381de11a9f2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-10 18:11:04</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
